title: Connessione
description: Two figures united by a central knot, symbol of complex bonds and interdependencies. An exploration of human connections that bind and define us.

title: Free Evil
description: Demonic mask chained on gilded canvas. Lamb bones evoke the Trinity, revealing how sacred and profane intertwine. Demons hide in the light.
materials: canvas, papier-mâché, chains, lamb bones, acrylics

title: Dreadful
description: Demonic sculpture with horns and red details that evokes terror and fascination. An exploration of darkness and ancestral fears.

title: Emersione
description: Figure emerging from dense, dark matter, only face and hands visible. Represents the struggle between sinking and resurfacing, between suffering and hope.
materials: wood, metal mesh, wire, expanding foam, plastic, spray paint

title: Ereditarietà
description: Sculptural portal with animals trapped in a degraded landscape. The interactive hourglass invites reflection on the environmental legacy we're building for future generations.
materials: wood, metal mesh, wire, expanding foam, plastic, paint

title: Leaves Behind
description: Mother and child in wood, 2x1.5m. A gesture of protection that appears futile in an era that has eroded authentic bonds. Love seems no longer enough.

title: Magma
description: Canvas with pink-brown colors and blue splashes evoking volcanic matter in motion. An explosion of primordial energy.

title: Maschera
description: Technological mask with LEDs, hair and industrial details. A cyborg face exploring identity in the digital age and the fusion of organic and mechanical.
materials: plastic, metal, LEDs, synthetic hair, fabric

title: Palude
description: Resin with hair, peacock feathers and cat bones. A dark place where childhood dreams dissolve, trapped in time like fragile memories.
materials: epoxy resin, peacock feathers, cat bones, human hair, cardboard, spheres, acrylics

title: Poltergeist
description: Two stylized childlike figures in black and white on canvas. A dreamlike atmosphere emphasizing how what appears frightening can be vulnerable. Fear is shared.

title: Pseudo-quadro₁
description: Sculptural assemblage with skull, bones and symbolic elements arranged in frames. An exploration of death and spirituality through found objects.
materials: wood, bones, plastic, metal, fabric, paints

title: Pseudo-quadro₂
description: Composition with frames, branches, skulls and religious figures. A profane altar mixing sacred and death in precarious balance.
materials: wood, branches, bones, plastic, metal, paints

title: Sands of Light
description: Sculptural lamp with integrated hourglass and luminous sphere. Time flows as light illuminates, a reminder of transience and the importance of the moment.

title: Scheletro Perla
description: Animal skeleton decorated with red fabric and silver details. Adorned death becomes celebration, a memento mori that challenges fear.

title: Specchio
description: Mirror framed by dark and red organic materials. Looking at one's reflection through decomposition, a confrontation with the fragility of identity.

title: Time Machine
description: Steampunk assemblage with clock and intertwined metals. An imaginary device representing humanity's desire to rewrite the past and correct mistakes.
materials: wood, brass, recycled metals, bulb, clock, spray paint
